pr_title: Fix hang when closeTaskTx if current thread is task worker

timeline.message:
fix graphs-list api return results with non STATUS-READ permission

Change-Id: I6a05e06509caf0ea525fb57ca8352e53ced584aa

let other thread close task tx if current is task thread

Change-Id: Iac11eeeaaaf0be5d01a85496a629ec5b2a387216

just call closeTx by one task thread if current is task thread

fix graphs-list api return results with non STATUS-READ permission
